message.404: The page that you requested was not found.
message.404BackToHome: Are you lost? Let me bring you back to the home page
message.unsupportedIe: Your version of Microsoft Internet Explorer is not supported and you may experience unexpected behaviours. Consider using another browser. Why not your mobile phone?
message.usingIe:
You are using an old version of Microsoft Internet Explorer. This website is now working in degraded mode, and you could fully enjoy it by using another browser.
Did you try with your smartphone's browser?
message.underConstruction:
This website is still under active development. Content is added regularly, so you can come back later to learn more about me :)
As features are implemented in an Agile manner, you may find the user experience poor at the beginning. Don't panic, this will be fixed in the future!
